title: Through Cast Iron Gates
description: Aubry MacNicholl is an irresistibly stunning woman, who is driven by her passions and desires. When she falls in love with the handsome and wealthy Patrick Putnam, she has it all. When the Halifax Explosion of 1917 rocks the city and devastates the land and its people, it separates the couple indefinately. Her search for her husband will take her across a macabre and terrifying city. Will she find a way back to him, or is there a more sinister force at play?
author: Betty  McEachern
